bibl.title: Menander. Eleven Plays

series.title: Proceedings of the Cambridge Philological Society. Supplementary Volume

bibl.note: Testimonia, text and critical apparatus for eleven of Menander's less well-known comedies: Georgos, Dis Exapaton, Enkheiridion, Heros, Theophoroumene, Karkhedonios, Kitharistes, Koneiazomenai, Leukadia, Perinthia, Phasma.
bibl.seg: Colin Austin, Menander. Eleven Plays = Proceedings of the Cambridge Philological Society. Supplementary Volume 37.
Cambridge, The Cambridge Philological Society, 2013, 8°, xviii-84 pp. ISBN 978-0-9568381-2-4. £20.

Testimonia, text and critical apparatus for eleven of Menander's less well-known comedies: Georgos, Dis Exapaton, Enkheiridion, Heros, Theophoroumene, Karkhedonios, Kitharistes, Koneiazomenai, Leukadia, Perinthia, Phasma.
C.R. par Benjamin Cartlidge, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2013/2013-10-41.html >. - Sarah Miles, CR N.S., 64 (2014) pp. 409-411. - Vinicio Tammaro, Eikasmos 25 (2014) pp. 510-512.
